replies.body:
@RiotEvaelin When are Emote sales supposed to start? 

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Emote sales will start in August - please keep an eye out for the August sales announcement, which will be published next week.

@RiotEvaelin Where are the December Sales Schedule and November Bundles?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Isnt Vi 4800 BE now so she should be 440 RP with the sale????
Hi! This was a bug and has been fixed now. Everyone who purchased Vi during this period will get a refund within 3 days.

It'll probably be correct in game.
Wouldn't be the first time the sales post had out dated info.
At least they seem to have the graphics right.
Nah, they screwed it up in game too, list at 487rp/6300be, a price increase in be lol.
